quote: If you truly love life, don’t waste time because time is what life is made of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: My principles are more important than the money or my title.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If we can’t help our family, who are we going to help?
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: You will continue to suffer if you have an emotional reaction to everything that is said to you. True power is sitting back and observing everything with logic. If words control you that means everyone else can control you. Breathe and allow things to pass.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: My only fault is that I don’t realize how great I really am.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Better to keep your mouth shut and appear stupid than to open it and remove all doubt.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps
author: Confucius

quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
author: Confucius

quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: To be successful you have to be selfish, or else you never achieve. And once you get to your highest level, then you have to be unselfish. Stay reachable. Stay in touch. Don't isolate.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Never say never, because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
author: Michael Jordan
